text: Ara yakhana tara tadera jinisapatra khulalo tara dekhate pela tadera drabyamulya tadera kache phiriye deya hayeche. Tara balale -- ''he amadera abba! Ki amara pratyasa kari? E'i to amadera drabyamulya amadera phiriye deya hayeche, ara amadera parijanabargera jan'ya amara rasada anate paraba, ara amadera bha'iyera amara hephajata karaba, ara amara eka utera parimapa atirikta anaba. Eti to eka saman'ya parimapa.â€™â€™
